Posts.EditableText: Im using 4.04 and getting errors. I remember seeing somewhere that it only worked for earlier versions. Is there an updated version out there anywhere?
Posts.HTML: Im using 4.04 and getting errors. I remember seeing somewhere that it only worked for earlier versions. Is there an updated version out there anywhere?

Posts.EditableText: No, the library was designed to add features to quest that many are now in version 4 and above, so is mostly no longer needed. What features did you want to use specifically from it?
Posts.HTML: No, the library was designed to add features to quest that many are now in version 4 and above, so is mostly no longer needed. What features did you want to use specifically from it?

Posts.EditableText: if i'm remembering correctly there was a lot of house keeping code around interaction with actors and being able to give them objects and such
Posts.HTML: if i'm remembering correctly there was a lot of house keeping code around interaction with actors and being able to give them objects and such
